HIS BRITANNIC 1&J3STY'S G0V3REECRET.CABINS T.,P, 2810.CENSUS Qi PRODUCTION,goto by the Seoretaryt Cabinet.With referenoe to Sir R, Horne's Memorandum (C.P.S775),I beg to inform the Cabinet that Mr. Chamberlain has agreed that the deoision taken by the Cabinet on 3rd. March last (Cabinet 10(21) Conclusion (4)) on the subjoot of the census of Produotion may be interpreted as authorising the Board of Trade to make arrangements for taking in 1923 a Census of Produotion for 1922. In the absence of any further observations it is proposed to regard this particular question as settled.(Sgd.) M,P.A. EINKSY.Secretary, Cabinet,, Whitehall Gardens, S..W. 8th April, 1921,
